column4: god I love the 9600 gt in Jaunty with the nvidia driver woohoo
I think I may have to switch to Kubuntu however, cuz I like KDE a bit more
I just ordered a 9500 gt cause I am not happy with what fglrx is doing with my radeon hd 3300
I had an xfx for some years which worked very well
is PNY really so much worse then your favorite BFG?
the PNY card I looked at had good reviews
pny doesn't implement the firmware well, and it can hang a bit in SLI
well if it sucks bad I will go with BFG okay?
stick with your heart man, it just wasn't for me
